name: metricx Team
bio: The metricx team brings together expertise in ad analytics, e-commerce growth, and data science to help merchants maximize their advertising ROI.

name: Sarah Chen

credentials: Former Head of Growth at leading DTC brand

name: Marcus Johnson
bio: Marcus is a data engineer and analytics expert who has built attribution systems for Fortune 500 retailers. He leads metricx's data infrastructure and analytics product.
credentials: Former Analytics Lead at major retailer

name: Emma Rodriguez
bio: Emma has helped 100+ Shopify brands scale their advertising. She brings hands-on experience from running her own e-commerce business and consulting for growing brands.

name: David Kim
bio: David specializes in Google Ads and Performance Max optimization. He previously managed $50M+ in annual ad spend for major e-commerce clients at a leading agency.

bio: Alex combines creative direction with data analysis to help brands develop high-performing ad creative. Background in both brand marketing and performance creative.
